message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.RO, cs.SE 

The paper discusses machine teaching and education, which are topics related to machine learning and artificial intelligence. The focus is on curriculum design for machines, which falls under the category of machine learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses the use of ontologies, which is a topic related to natural language processing and computational linguistics, falling under cs.CL (Computation and Language). The mention of modular neural networks suggests a connection to robotics and control, which falls under cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.SE (Software Engineering).
